Author: bitterviaproxy
Text: Don't feel bad!  If he didn't notice any change, it sounds like some of that weight gain may be muscle, which is denser so it sits on your body very differently and doesn't affect your shape as much, which is great! And of course more muscle = higher metabolic rate.  Either way, please don't be too hard on yourself. What we see in the mirror is so so so different than what everyone else sees.  Stay safe ‚ù§
